question: Identify the correct statement
choices: A current carrying conductor produces an electric field around it.
A straight current carrying conductor has circular magnetic field lines around it.
The direction of magnetic field due to a current element is given by Flemings Left Hand Rule
The magnetic field inside a solenoid is non-uniform
explanation: A straight current-carrying conductor produces magnetic field lines in the form of concentric circles (Right Hand Thumb Rule).
Statement 3 is false (Field direction is by Right Hand Rule).
Statement 4 is false (Field inside solenoid is uniform).
